original_text: He regarded disgrace for the sake of Christ as of greater value than the treasures of Egypt, because he was looking ahead to his reward.
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 받는 수모를 애굽의 모든 보화보다 더 큰 재물로 여겼으니 이는 상 주심을 바라봄이라

sentences.original_text: He regarded disgrace for the sake of Christ
as of greater value than the treasures of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽의 보물들보다 더 큰 가치가 있는 것으로

sentences.original_text: because he was looking ahead to his reward
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 자신의 상급을 바라보고 있었기 때문입니다
